data.title: Unit 1 : The Human Body
Parts of the human body
data.rubric: These are the parts of our body that we can't see. They lie inside our body.
data.text: The heart pumps blood around the body.
The brain controls our thoughts and movements.
The lungs help us to breathe.
The skeleton supports and protects our body.
The kidneys filter the waste products from the body which then go out as urine.
